Recipe: In a glass, muddle 8-10 fresh mint leaves and 1 tbsp sugar together.
Add 1 oz lime juice and stir until the sugar dissolves.
Fill the glass with ice.
Pour in 2 oz white rum and 2 oz soda water.
Stir well and garnish with a sprig of mint leaves.
Rim the glass with salt by running a lime wedge along the rim and dipping it in salt.
In a shaker, combine 2 oz tequila, 1 oz lime juice, and 1 oz triple sec with ice.
Shake well and strain into the prepared glass filled with ice.
Garnish with a lime wheel or wedge.
Fill a mixing glass or shaker with ice.
Add 2 oz gin and 1/2 oz dry vermouth.
Stir or shake until well-chilled.
Strain into a chilled martini glass.
Garnish with an olive on a cocktail pick.
In an Old Fashioned glass, muddle 1 tsp sugar, 2 dashes bitters, and a splash of soda water.
Add 2 oz whiskey and stir until the sugar dissolves.
Fill the glass with ice.
Gently stir for about 30 seconds.
Express the oils from an orange peel over the glass and garnish with a cherry.
Fill a shaker with ice.
Add 1 1/2 oz vodka, 1 oz cranberry juice, 1/2 oz triple sec, and 1/2 oz lime juice.
Shake well until chilled.
Strain into a martini glass.
Garnish with a few cranberries on a cocktail pick.
Fill a shaker with ice.
Add 2 oz rum, 1 oz lime juice, and 3/4 oz simple syrup.
Shake well until chilled.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Optionally, garnish with a lime wheel.
Fill a blender with ice.
Add 2 oz rum, 3 oz pineapple juice, and 2 oz coconut cream.
Blend until smooth.
Pour into a tall glass.
Garnish with a pineapple wedge or cherry, if desired.
Fill a mixing glass or shaker with ice.
Add 1 oz gin, 1 oz Campari, and 1 oz sweet vermouth.
Stir or shake until well-chilled.
Strain into an glass over ice.
Garnish with an orange twist.
Fill a shaker with ice.
Add 1 1/2 oz vodka, 1 oz coffee liqueur, 1 oz espresso, and 1/2 oz simple syrup.
Shake vigorously until well-chilled.
Strain into a chilled martini glass.
Optionally, garnish with coffee beans on top.
Fill a copper mug or highball glass with ice.
Add 2 oz vodka and 4-6 oz ginger beer.
Squeeze in 1/2 oz lime juice.
Stir gently to combine.
Garnish with a lime wheel or wedge.
In a glass, combine 1 1/2 oz vodka, 3 oz tomato juice, 1/2 oz Worcestershire sauce, and 2-3 dashes hot sauce.
Add spices according to your preference (e.g., celery salt, black pepper, paprika).
Stir well to mix all ingredients.
Garnish with a celery stalk and a lemon wedge.
